dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, I heard about these trash cans, like, in Aktau, just falling over. Probably just cheap stuff, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, I heard about these trash cans, like, in Aktau, just falling over. Probably just cheap stuff, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Aktau, newly installed underground waste containers have collapsed into the ground, citing Lada.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, actually, uh, no, not quite. It's specifically underground waste containers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, actually, uh, no, not quite. It's specifically underground waste containers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Aktau, newly installed underground waste containers have collapsed into the ground...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Underground? What? How does a whole underground thing just, like, collapse? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Underground? What? How does a whole underground thing just, like, collapse? That's wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, residents are saying it was heavy rainfall, caused soil erosion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, residents are saying it was heavy rainfall, caused soil erosion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to residents, heavy rainfall caused soil erosion, leading to the collapse of the new underground waste containers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Erosion? So it wasn't, like, the bins themselves were just poorly installed then? It was the ground?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Erosion? So it wasn't, like, the bins themselves were just poorly installed then? It was the ground?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the ground gave way, according to the residents. That's what they're, um, citing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the ground gave way, according to the residents. That's what they're, um, citing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to residents, heavy rainfall caused soil erosion, leading to the collapse of the new underground waste containers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So what's, like, the local government doing about it? Are they just leaving this giant hole?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So what's, like, the local government doing about it? Are they just leaving this giant hole?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no. The Aktau akimat, their press service, they said the municipal utilities are addressing it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no. The Aktau akimat, their press service, they said the municipal utilities are addressing it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Aktau akimat (local government administration) press service stated that the municipal utilities department is addressing the issue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay. And uh, what does "addressing it" mean? Like, are they sending someone?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay. And uh, what does addressing it mean? Like, are they sending someone?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They've told the original contractor, the one responsible, to restore the area.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They've told the original contractor, the one responsible, to restore the area.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The department has instructed the contractor responsible for the project to restore the area to its original state.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the contractor. Interesting. So, they have to fix their own mess?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the contractor. Interesting. So, they have to fix their own mess?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, that's the instruction. And, uh, they've already put up safety barriers around the site.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, that's the instruction. And, uh, they've already put up safety barriers around the site.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities have already placed safety barriers around the affected site.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Safety barriers, okay. But when does the actual fixing start?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Safety barriers, okay. But when does the actual fixing start?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Officials said, like, restoration will begin once weather conditions stabilize.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Officials said, like, restoration will begin once weather conditions stabilize.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Officials assured that restoration work will begin once weather conditions stabilize.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. So, uh, do we know who this contractor is? Or, like, how much money was spent on these collapsing bins?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. So, uh, do we know who this contractor is? Or, like, how much money was spent on these collapsing bins?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-uh. That information hasn't been disclosed yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-uh. That information hasn't been disclosed yet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The name of the contractor and the budget allocated for the installation of these containers have not yet been disclosed.
